bilingual.source: The accessor allows you to retrieve data from the database.
bilingual.target: 访问器允许你从数据库中检索数据。

bilingual.source: Use getters to retrieve data from the store in Vuex.
bilingual.target: 使用获取器方法从Vuex的存储中检索数据。

bilingual.source: The search engine uses complex indexes to retrieve information.
bilingual.target: 搜索引擎使用复杂的索引来检索信息。

bilingual.source: The hashtable can quickly retrieve the value associated with a key.
bilingual.target: 哈希表可以快速检索与键关联的值。

bilingual.source: Few people know how to retrieve information properly.
bilingual.target: 很少有人知道如何正确地检索信息。

bilingual.source: To retrieve the latest copy of the list, click Refresh.
bilingual.target: 若要检索此列表的最新副本, 请单击“刷新”.

bilingual.source: Ultra high speed retrieve for those special techniques and tactics.
bilingual.target: 超高速检索为那些特殊的技术和战术。

bilingual.source: Unable to retrieve master component keyword list from the server.
bilingual.target: 无法从服务器中检索主组件关键字列表.

bilingual.source: Do you want to transactionally retrieve messages from this queue?
bilingual.target: 确实要对此队列进行事务性消息检索吗?。

bilingual.source: Cannot retrieve file mapping size while initializing configuration settings.
bilingual.target: 初始化配置设置时无法检索文件映射大小.

list.abstract: retrieve是一个英语单词，其意思是恢复、挽回、取回之意。
《Retrieve》是一款像素风横板动作游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: And it has the scepter. Now we have to retrieve it, again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它拿走了权杖，我们又得重新夺回来。

yingyinNormal.en: The troops are quartered. Burial preparations are underway for those we were able to retrieve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 部队已经安营扎寨，正在准备埋葬能找回的遗体。

yingyinNormal.en: Our satellites aren't enough. We'd have to get men to the blast site, retrieve soil samples and blast debris.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的卫星不够，我们得派人去爆炸地点采集土壤样本和爆炸残片。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, at least now you can retrieve the black box from the twisted, olsmdering wreckage that was once your fantasy of dating her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是你现在还能从燃烧的废墟里找回装满对她美妙幻想的黑匣子。

yingyinNormal.en: You're gonna need to signal the crazy ants to blow the servers, retrieve the suit, and exit the vaults before the backup power comes on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你需要在备用电源恢复前指挥狂蚁破坏服务器，拿到战服，离开保险库。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 密切合作回收空间碎片。

examination_example.sentence: So it is not really your memory letting you down; just your ability to <highlight>retrieve</highlight> information from it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以这并不是说你的记忆里给你拖了后腿，而是你从脑海中获取已经存储了的信息的能力。

examination_example.sentence: Many birds like to store food for the winter, which they subsequently <highlight>retrieve</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多鸟类喜欢为冬天储存食物，然后取回。

sense_info_list.en: find or extract information stored in a computer

examination_example.sentence: Toyohashi University of Technology has developed Terapio, a robotic medical cart that can make hospital rounds, deliver medications and other items, and <highlight>retrieve</highlight> records.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 丰桥技术科学大学(Toyohashi University of Technology)开发了一种机器人医疗车“Terapio”，它可以在医院巡视，运送药品和其他物品，并检索记录。

examination_example.sentence: Few people know how to <highlight>retrieve</highlight> information properly.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The underlined word “<highlight>retrieving</highlight>” would probably mean “getting back ”.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下划线的单词“找回”可能意味着“找回”。

examination_example.sentence: What's the meaning of the underlined word "<highlight>retrieve</highlight>"?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 带下划线的单词“找回”是什么意思？

sense_info_list.en: find or extract information stored in a computer

examination_example.sentence: Students who can test themselves earlier will be better at <highlight>retrieving</highlight> the knowledge from the memory and keep it in the long run.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能够提前测试自己的学生将更善于从记忆中检索知识，并长期保持。
